notes_translated.fr: La 4e édition de l'Atlas national du Canada (1974) contient deux jeux de cartes sur la production agricole. Dans le premier jeu, les cartes montrent, par division de recensement, la valeur des ventes à la ferme pour les élevages de chevaux et les élevages de moutons de 1960 et 1961 et sont accompagnées d'une note complémentaire indiquant la valeur totale des ventes à la ferme pour le Canada, les provinces et les territoires. Dans le deuxième jeu, la première carte montre, par division de recensement, la valeur des ventes à la ferme pour l'exploitation des pommes de terre, des cultures racines (navet, betterave fourragère, etc.), du tabac et des betteraves sucrières ainsi que de diverses autres grandes cultures pour 1960 et 1961. Elle est accompagnée d'une note complémentaire indiquant la valeur totale des ventes à la ferme pour le Canada, les provinces et les territoires. La seconde carte de ce jeu montre les acres plantés et leur étendue, par division de recensement, pour l'exploitation de pommes de terre et est accompagnée d'une note complémentaire indiquant la superficie totale d'acres plantés pour le Canada, les provinces et les territoires.
notes_translated.en: Contained within the 4th Edition (1974) of the Atlas of Canada are two sets of maps. In the first set, the maps show the value, by census division, of horse farm sales and sheep farm sales for 1960 to 1961. Both of these first maps are accompanied by a supplementary text giving the total sales values for Canada, the provinces and the territories. In the second set, the first map shows the value, by census division, of potato, root (turnips, mangels etc.), tobacco and sugar beet farm sales as well as various other field crops for 1960 to 1961 and is also accompanied by a supplementary text giving the total values for Canada, the provinces and the territories. The next map in this second set shows the size and extent of seeded acres, by census division, for potatoes and is accompanied by a supplementary text as well, which gives the total area for Canada, the provinces and the territories.

subject: agriculture

In the first set, the maps show the value, by census division, of horse farm sales and sheep farm sales for 1960 to 1961. Both of these first maps are accompanied by a supplementary text giving the total sales values for Canada, the provinces and the territories. In the second set, the first map shows the value, by census division, of potato, root (turnips, mangels etc.), tobacco and sugar beet farm sales as well as various other field crops for 1960 to 1961 and is also accompanied by a supplementary text giving the total values for Canada, the provinces and the territories. The next map in this second set shows the size and extent of seeded acres, by census division, for potatoes and is accompanied by a supplementary text as well, which gives the total area for Canada, the provinces and the territories.
